page.title: 06HEALTH - NORTH TAWTON
page.content: There is 1 doctor in North Tawton he works 5 days a week from 9 to 12 in the morning. He is on call all day. He has a bleeper for emergencies this bleeper is radio controlled from Exeter.There is a dental surgery in Okehampton 7 miles away.There is a health visitor & a district nurse who visit the old.There is also a chemist in North Tawton who dispenses tablets & medicine. If you have a major injury you go to Exeter.If you only had a minor injury you would go to Okehampton District Hospital.
